pluginstrument.author: enjxp_SimPassion
pluginstrument.description:
Requires at least ZiboMod 3_56_EA_68
--------------------------------------------------- Transcripted by enjxp_SimPassion to ZiboMod I've also designed and re-created all buttons, dials and switches --------------------------------------------------- For main background image : using original background and global panel lights graphics parts from ZiboMod, thanks to the kind agreement of the designer AudioBirdXP
---------------------------------------------------
-- Hardware Ready using Arduino board for Cockpit builders --62PINS for I/O --------------------- --3OUTPUTS: by Single or Daisychained - MAX7219 Displays LEDs (Maxi 4 Daisychained) --12INPUTS: Dials --5INPUTS: Bank Switch --8INPUTS: FDA/AT/DISENGAGE/FDB Switches --17INPUTS: Push Buttons --17OUTPUTS: LEDs
--------------------------------------------------- This panel is based on Russ Barlow's MCP for the EADT x737, which is based on Joe Venzon Boeing 737NG MCP -------------------------------------------------- This Mode Control Panel (MCP) is only usable with ZiboMod Boeing 737-800X for X-Plane 11. The panel duplicates the function of the B737-800X's MCP.
See Logic.lua for changelog
